About Me

A little bit about me...

BIO

Hello! My name is Eric, and I love taking things apart and putting them back together again in order to figure out what makes things, do things! This passion for understanding how the world works "underneath the hood", so to speak, eventually led me to explore how and why our world was being rapidly dominated by these little boxes located in most homes across the developed world. This spark of curiosity quickly turned into an obsession with computer programming. I quickly realized that to be able to communicate with a computer was to wield a tremendous power. The first time I went on Codecademy and made "Hello World!" show up in a browser, I was hooked. My keyboard suddenly became my wand, and my computer became my book of spells. FINALLY I had found a way to potentially make a profound impact in the world *doing something that I love doing. Roughly 3 years from the time when those simple h1 tags with "Hello World" typed between them changed the course of my life, I am now the "go-to-guy" amongst family and friends when a website needs to be built.
